name: Market Frenzy
description:
This game is made for #inkjam21.

Game jam page : https://itch.io/jam/inkjam-2021/rate/1180064

Story : The curfew is about to begin. You need to buy the necessary items. But do not appear to other customers. you may regret :D

Controls:

Tab : tab opens list

W, A, S, D, : Movement

R: Restart level

Mouse left click: Get objects

Team: 

Edinbo:Pixel Artist - Pixel Animator
- youtube.com/channel/UCmks1OfNtsQ9NY-wRIZevGA
   Gonna make Devlogs Soon!

Kenobi:Coder - Level Designer - Sfx Designer
    https://strawberrydev.itch.io

No ready-made assets are used in our game, except for music and sounds.

Music:https://freesound.org/people/BloodPixelHero/sounds/565048/

The game was made in Unity 2019 and Aseprite.
